value:
$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Princess Laevatein!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Your name is...Hana, correct?
What do you need of me?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|I have something to ask of you.
Are you willing to engage in some
ninja-style "investigations"?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Hm? Investigations? What do you
want investigated?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Well, there's a tournament coming
up related to the ninja festival.$k$pThe strongest entrants appear to be
Navarre, Zihark, and then Lyn and
Florina—who've entered as a team.$k$pIf we can learn anything about them
before the fighting starts, we might
be able to get an advantage!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|I see. My sister would agree that
knowing your enemy is important.$k$pI will go along with it.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|All right! Then let's get investigating!
Actually, wait... Hmmm... We might
have a bit of a problem.$k$pLyn and Florina are always together,
and Navarre is terrifying... Maybe we
should focus on Zihark?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|I've heard a little about Zihark.
He sounds like a good place
to start investigating.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Then it's decided! Let's prowl
through the shadows like the
ninja we are. Sneaky, stealthy...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Sneaky. Stealthy.$k$p

$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|Oh, Hana, Princess Laevatein!
You two look a bit glum. Is there
something wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Ah! Z-Zihark!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|Whoa! No need to be spooked!
Now, what happened?$k$pFestivals are for having fun and
enjoying your chance to dress up,
not moping around!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Well, you see... Oh, I'm sorry, Zihark!
We were were just investigating you,
and we—$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|Me? Why investigate me?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Well, since we're dressed as ninja,
we wanted to do something that felt
properly ninja-like...$k$pAnd we thought maybe we could get
an advantage in the tournament too...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|But we discovered more than
we intended... About your past.
About your former love...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|Ah. Well, there are some around
here who already know all about
that, I suppose.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|We're sorry for digging into your
past, Zihark! We didn't intend to
investigate your love life...$k$pOh! I know how to fix it! If we just
hit each other on the head really
hard, we'll forget about it, and—$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|That won't be necessary. But I'd
recommend not investigating into
me any further, all right?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Of course. Again, we apologize.
We brought painful memories
to the surface, I'm sure...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|No need to worry. It's not as if I want
to forget her. I treasure the time the
two of us spent together.$k$pEven now, I wrap myself in those
happy memories whenever I can.
Maybe I'm just the nostalgic type.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|I understand.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|We must have something in common
then... But still! A festival is no place
to be so gloomy. We should enjoy it!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|You're right. Thank you, Zihark.
I'll see you at the tournament!
I'm bringing everything I've got.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者ツイハーク,ch09_22_Twihark_M_Ninja20,Face|Then I'll be sure to do the same.
I'll look forward to it! For now, I'll
be on my way, though. See you!$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|Phew! We're lucky Zihark is such
a kind person.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|He reminds me of my sister...
Kind, understanding of others'
pain, and incredibly strong...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カザハナ,ch05_02_Kazahana_F_Ninja20,Face|That's true. It's a particular kind
of strength I'd like to aspire to...$k$pWe both use swords, after all!
Though, I don't get the same
kind of respect he gets.$k$pWell, I guess I'll just have to beat him
in the tournament! Let's go give it our
best, Princess Laevatein.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Ninja20,Face|Right!$k$p
